name: MAUL
description:
MAUL by Thomas Perry and Tyler Zudans.

The forest is dying and so are you [a bear]. Put up a final stand to fight back and get enough fat before winter. Beware of animal control . . . they will stop at nothing to protect their town.

Created in Spring of 2020 for CSM-CSCI477 final project. Original Pixel Art by Tyler Zudans and Thomas Perry. Programming by Thomas Perry and Tyler Zudans.

All copyrighted audio used falls under fair use for educational purposes given that this game is non-commercial and non-profit.  https://fairuse.stanford.edu/overview/academic-and-educational-permissions/non-c...
